addItemMessage.en:
You haven't added any items to this split.
Add an item to get started!

addPersonMessage.en:
You haven't added anyone to Splitty.
Add a person to get started!

invalidPrice.en: Please enter a valid price for this item.

missingName.en: Please provide a name for this item.

noPeople.en: You haven't added anyone to Splitty! Go to the People tab and add everyone you want to split with, then come back here.

noSelectedPeople.en: Please select one or more people to continue.

noSplits.en: You haven't made any splits! Go to the New Split tab, make a split, and save it. You'll be able to review it here.

saveSplitInstructions.en: Enter a name for this split. The date will be saved automatically.
